availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, resident. Crab Orchard, Kentucky native. Married to Martha F. Warren Severance on April 29, 1864. Father of James Severance. Resident in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 119.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Lincoln County 1851-1902, p. 73.
Find A Grave, "Joseph Severance (1838-1897)," Memorial #78009052, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/78009052 (accessed November 28, 2018).
